member.name: N:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching
member.summary: The Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching namespace provides access to an in-memory application cache application for developing scalable, high-performance applications. This namespace can be used to cache any serializable common language runtime (CLR) object and provides access through simple APIs.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.BaseOperationNotification
member.summary: The base class for an event used for notifications. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.
member.param: Version of the operation which caused the notification.
Name of the cache in which the operation occurred.
Type of the operation which caused the notification.

member.summary: Returns the string representation of the BaseOperationNotification event. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.BaseOperationNotification.CacheName
member.summary: Name of the cache in which the operation occurred. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.BaseOperationNotification.OperationType
member.summary: The type of the operation which caused the notification. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.BaseOperationNotification.Version
member.summary: The version of the operation which caused the notification. Applies to Windows Server AppFabric only.
member.returns: Returns .

member.summary: Provides support for changing the logging level of Windows Azure AppFabric caching.

member.summary: Used to compare two versions of the same item, specified with the same key.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheInvalidationPolicy.TimeoutBased
member.summary: Specifies that objects will stay in local cache until their lifetime reaches the localCacheTimeout duration specified in the DataCacheFactory constructor.

member.returns: Returns a that can be passed to the method in the case of a rollback.

member.summary: Begins a transaction to provide isolation from other configuration store access.
member.returns: Returns a that represents the transaction context..

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.ICustomProvider.Cleanup
member.summary: Enables the provider to clean up any data in the cache cluster configuration store.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.ICustomProvider.Delete(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes an existing entry from the configuration store.
member.param: The transaction context object associated with this entry.
The type of entry to be enumerated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.ICustomProvider.Delete(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Deletes an existing entry from the configuration store.
member.returns: Returns . If the deletion succeeds, the return value is true. If the entry does not exist or if the version does not match, the return value is false.
member.param: The version of the entry. If this value is less than or equal to 0, the deletion occurs regardless of the version. If this value is greater than 0, then the deletion is only performed if the version of the entry matches the version provided.
The transaction context object associated with this entry.
The type of entry to be enumerated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.ICustomProvider.EndTransaction(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Commits or rollbacks a transaction previously started with the method.
member.param: An object that represents the transaction context. This object is returned from the method.
If true, the transaction should be rolled back. If false, the transaction should be committed.
